title: Please Jaxon Dixie
description: Jaxon Dixie demands excellence from his employees, perfection in jewelry, and total submission from beautiful women. Monica Collins is strong minded, intelligent, and a perfect ten. She works for Jaxon. He discovers a molecular compound, present only near the equator, which is superconductive at room temperature. It promises to revolutionize the worldâ€™s electric grid and make him into one of the wealthiest people on Earth. Jordan Peugeot expertly weaves adventure and science together with dominance and submission, taking readers on an exhilarating ride that explores the deepest jungles of Africa and the even deeper recesses of the human mind. This is a unique novel that blends steamy sexuality with an exciting tale of money, greed, betrayal and revenge.
author: Jordan Peugeot
